website_summaries.verdict: This is an impressive upper-body wrap that has a pleasing aesthetic and is highly effective for relieving stress, tension, and stress.
pros: This upper-body wrap has a unique design that makes it easy to wear, especially since it’s sure to stay in place via hook-and-loop closure
A comfortable weight to wear for extended periods
Can also be placed in the freezer for cold therapy
cons: Has a strong smell at first, although it fades after several uses

customer_reviews.title: That's a wrap!
customer_reviews.text: I have been having problems with my shoulder/neck/back so I bought this as I figured it would be better than a regular heating pad. It does a good job of conforming to your shoulder and back much better than a heating pad. It does have a very strong smell to it but it does fade after several uses to a much more subtle scent. It is quite heavy as it should be which didn't bother me but its something to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for chronic pain and shoulder pain
customer_reviews.text: I have a pinched nerve in my shoulder from surgery so I deal with daily chronic pain. I have tried various neck wraps and heating pads that you microwave or plug into an outlet but this upper body wrap and even the neck wrap are by far the best products I've come across. It arrived quickly and is easy to use. I love the Velcro on the upper body wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Wonderwoman

customer_reviews.title: Best heating pad ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for christmas for my fiance. He loves it and it smells so good when you heat it up. His shoulders and neck are sore and aches when he gets home from work, I heat this up for him and he sleeps so much better! This product is the best thing I have used in a while and the fact that it is American made is even better. Shipping was fast and it actually arrived sooner than expected. I plan on buying several more for family and friends as gifts. Makes such a nice gift, and they can use it all year round!!!
customer_reviews.author: mwge

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, hits the spots but doesn't stay hot that long
customer_reviews.text: This wrap smells heavenly (like chamomile tea) and hits all the usual sore spots. I found I had to heat it for longer than suggested-2 minutes-possibly due to my microwave. The heat doesn't last as long as my old one used to so that is a slight disappointment since I have to get up every 15- 20 min to reheat. (for 1min 30sec). However that is probably healthier than sitting for a long time.:)
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: I also found that the herbs inside the pack started to smell terrible after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go whole hog and purchase a quality heat pack. Unfortunately, this one quickly started to leak. I also found that the herbs inside the pack started to smell terrible after a few uses. I now have a leaky pack that is useless. It's too late to return it, otherwise, I would send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: How really well they work when heated and I love what they do for my chronic back pain.
customer_reviews.text: These are the most wonderful heating pads I have ever used. Got my 1st one about 20 yrs. ago & have been using them, usually every day, for chronic back pain, since. Heated in the microwave, they feel so good and ease the back pain that comes from standing or walking too long & keep me from having to take more medication (who wouldn't want that?) I'm actually using 1 right now after doing some vacuuming. Couldn't recommend them more highly!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Doorack

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy to see unscented now available
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd one. Repeated heating over the years causes the fabric to tear in places spilling the contents. I'm happy to see unscented now available. Before I had to put it outside to air out some the fragrance was so strong. I don't go anyway without mine. Great for all those aches & pains, muscle cramps or just warming you up.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Not useful as an ice compress
customer_reviews.text: It did not get or stay cold enough, even straight out of the freezer. I did not try it heated, however, so I can't comment on those effects.
customer_reviews.author: CandyCane

customer_reviews.title: Plan on purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.text: “I got this for my father who has arthritis in his shoulders and it sits nicely on his shoulders without it slipping. I like it as it does not have to be plugged in and with his Parkinson's I don't have to worry about him trying to plug it in. The natural content of course is a major plus. I will eventually be getting another for myself.”
customer_reviews.author: LLS

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but looses heat quickly
customer_reviews.text: This works great and feels great, but I have to put it in the microwave often to heat it back up compared to just a regular rectangular heating/cold herbal pack.
customer_reviews.author: Tara J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect transaction and great value. Product was received quickly and was as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I love this heat pack. It has a very nice and soothing aroma and I love how it wraps around my neck. The Velcro allows me to wear it while doing light chores without having it slide off. My shoulder pain extends up my neck so the heat helps immensely. I will definitely be ordering from Nature Creation again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best mate on all long day of work
customer_reviews.text: Best mate on all long day of work!!!! Never had a dull moment with this!! My mom and sister loved it too!!!!.
customer_reviews.author: Lakshmy Moorthy

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I use it when I feel pain ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I use it when I feel pain in my neck and shoulders from herniated discs. Wish the neck opening was a tad larger. This feels like it was made for a small person. I have a larger frame.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Fischer

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed in this for the money
customer_reviews.text: VERY disappointed in this for the money. Made from really thin material. Not big enough to reach shoulders. I can make one from rice and scrap material for a fraction of the price. Will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina R. Poe

customer_reviews.title: I had one for years and it started to get threadbare and was so happy to find that I could still buy this same ...
customer_reviews.text: This pad is a MUST!!!!!! I use it even when I'm not aching, as it totally relaxes my muscles... I have arthritis and sciatica and I cannot go without using this body wrap. I had one for years and it started to get threadbare and was so happy to find that I could still buy this same product .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Heating Pad For Shoulders
customer_reviews.text: Made very well and has a clasp to help hold in place. I would have liked if the shoulders were a little more closed in.
customer_reviews.author: Carbl

customer_reviews.title: bought for all my kids
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had one for for over 10 years, use it all winter long. Still heats and smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Marvin

customer_reviews.title: High quality we have !
customer_reviews.text: We like this product and have 3. We have given 3 as gifts and speak highly of the build quality and easy of use for the result. Just toss in the microwave for 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: rossco

customer_reviews.title: ... a few years ago for Christmas and have absolutely loved it. Whether I have a specific strain/injury or ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this wrap a few years ago for Christmas and have absolutely loved it. Whether I have a specific strain/injury or have just had a long day (!) it is a super soothing treatment. I've given them to other friends and family who either have an injury or are in a tough season and can use some extra TLC - everybody loves them. Great product, great price & great service is a really great combo.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love this wrap
customer_reviews.text: Love this wrap! I use it quite often, to relax and soothe the achy muscles. Keeps warm for about 15 min. The intense heat fades as the time goes by as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Not very warm
customer_reviews.text: Stays warm for a very short time - not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: GZN

customer_reviews.title: Alternative way to releive pain and stress
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a nothers day gift for my mom for the 2nd time . It helped her releive her back pain due to scoliosis and releive stress and tension
customer_reviews.author: Albert Reynold B. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: ... upper body wrap on time and it came with good instructions for use
customer_reviews.text: “I received my upper body wrap on time and it came with good instructions for use. It's very well made and covers a good area of my shoulders and chest. I like the blue flowers too. I used it as a cold pack so far and it holds the cold very well (I didn't time it). I'm very pleased with it and would order again from Nature's Creation.”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something that would improve this - a neck collar attached would make this the best ever. As is
customer_reviews.text: Works well, the side to side ridges keep the filling distributed very well and keeps it hot a while. Something that would improve this - a neck collar attached would make this the best ever. As is, the neck seam is a bit uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this wrap
customer_reviews.text: Excellent heat/cold wrap. This is my second one. The first wore out. I love the wraps flexibility. I can wrap it closely over neck and shoulder muscles. It also has a soothing herbal fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Gordon James

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is heavy and can keep warm for a short time only
customer_reviews.author: Hang Le

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: The wrap covers better than anything I've ever had. The herbs smell wonderful and the Velcro fastener keeps it in place so I can move while wearing it. I love it! Thanks for a quality product and good customer follow up.”
customer_reviews.author: Cardmaker

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work ok. Not a fan of the smell of what was added to it
customer_reviews.author: CPO

customer_reviews.title: These things are great -- for a few months
customer_reviews.text: i order and reorder. but the fabric is so flimsey they always rip and leave the herbs all over my house its awful

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again only if the quality was better
customer_reviews.text: Has the same name as the brand that was available in the Mall. Heats up ok but most disappointed with the quality . Woke up this morning to find many of the beads inside the warmer spilled out. The stitches opened up 😲

customer_reviews.title: Great product- great service
customer_reviews.text: I use mostly for warmth- scent is quite strong but will get better as time goes by.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Rotman

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom last year and it still smells amazing

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhhhh-mazing
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for shoulder and neck tension and headaches... relieves tight muscles and leaves us feeling refreshed and relaxed!

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Product
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly what I have been looking for. Very comfortable and flexible so it lays exactly where I need it, I have neck and shoulder issues and this does both at the same time. Great Product. Oh and it smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: It is good! I would like one the covers more the ...
customer_reviews.text: It is good! I would like one the covers more the back down, that only the shoulders.... but that is my fault :-(

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I like the size but it loses it's heat or coldness ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the size but it loses it's heat or coldness too fast. I had to get used to the herbal smell at first.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful product. My grandmother turned 89 this year and is very happy with her birthday gift. Perfect for soothing her minor pains and keeping her warm. Timely delivery and nice personal touch from Nature Creation.

customer_reviews.title: Heat Therapy feels great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We love the herbal infused filling. 2 1/2 minutes in the microwave and it provides a couple of hours of warmth. We will use this a lot.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Smells awesome and works extremely well!!

customer_reviews.title: A great product. ”
customer_reviews.text: “Even though the pac doesn't cover my shoulders, the warmth and soothing effect travels down the arms. A great product.”

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have had this wrap for only 7 months and it had a hole in it already!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the wrap once so far, but it worked great. Pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: DesertRae

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product ...much better than the electric heating pad I had been using. It does an excellent job providing moist heat on my upper back, lower neck and shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Nohea Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my adult daughter because she has sore ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my adult daughter because she has sore muscles in her neck and shoulders from her job. She loves it!”
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality product with wonderful aroma plus heat or cold as needed!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Estes

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, sturdy and comfortable. I have bought a lot of heat wraps over the years and this is definitely a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Simmerman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and it doesn't have an overwhelming scent. Just a very pleasant aroma.
customer_reviews.author: LGM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice to put this on and walk around if I need and not have to keep situating it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer V. Young

customer_reviews.title: Hoped for more
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this. I have a serious cervical herniated disk and have been using a sock filled with rice microwaved for heat relief. Just 2 minutes and the heat would last 30-35 minutes. Then I saw this with it being a wrap and the scent I had to order it. But even after 1:50-2:00 in microwave I get 10-15 minutes and it goes cold. I am spending more time at microwave then I am using it. It does serve a purpose and I will continue to use it but it disappoints
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Very comforting
customer_reviews.text: I love this body/shoulder wrap. It can be put in the freezer for a cold wrap, but I like it best after warming it up in the microwave to use as a heat wrap. Besides a shoulder wrap, it works well on my lower back. I warm it up before going to bed and sleep on it and feel great in the morning. It has a soothing, comforting aroma as well. I highly recommend this wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for my older mom wit shoulder issues
customer_reviews.text: Great for my older mom wit shoulder issues. We bought two, one color to in the freezer in a strong provided zip lock and another to heat in the mic when required. love the little hearts they included, great for the underarm. The scent was a bit more then we expected as we opened the package, we were concerned it would be a bit much, but this reduced with multiple uses. Good product, prompt delivery...
customer_reviews.author: mo

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Having owned one previously for almost 10 years, it was finally starting to wear a little thin in spots and was starting to leak. So I ordered the new one.....less than 2 months later.....its sprung a leak. The material is very inferior to the old one I had and I am very disappointed with my purchase, especially as the "return window" is now passed.
customer_reviews.author: RockabettyRed

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hot or cold!
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this wrap daily, after heating it in the microwave. This is replacing one he's had for four years, which finally got too dirty to use anymore. The old one still has a nice, mellow herbal scent upon heating...after all this time!! He uses it every morning for tight muscles & general neck/shoulder pain & says it's the single best thing for this he's ever used. I've used it chilled occasionally (I prefer cold rather than heat for soreness) & find it very soothing. Wonderful item & so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: L. West

customer_reviews.title: An effective and well made item for shoulder injuries!
customer_reviews.text: This item was selected as a gift for friend who has a bruised shoulder! We have this item in our house and have found it very effective for neck and shoulder injuries! Everything was delivered in pristine order!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: “Very fast shipping. This is my second wrap from this company. My first purchase was about 10 years ago. That wrap is still in perfect condition and smells so nice! It's perfect for my headaches, shoulder aches...and just makes me feel cozy when I use it. I am very sensitive to loud chemically smells-these are mellow, natural smells :) I bought a second (this purchase) as a gift for someone. “
customer_reviews.author: MrsD

customer_reviews.title: Best gift I have ever gotten!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for several years. It is so great when my daughter and a dear friend used it, they wanted one. I gave them one each for their Birthdays! Mine still has it's fragrance, after about 6 years!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Koch

customer_reviews.title: This upper body wrap does the trick.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this upper body wrap for my wife who has neck and shoulder issues. She pretty much uses it for hot therapy everyday to help relax her tired and stressed muscles. It fits easily in the microwave and has a soothing unique scent for aroma therapy. I may have to buy another one because I find my son using it as well.
customer_reviews.author: SJF

customer_reviews.title: easy to heat
customer_reviews.text: This is my second herbal pack from Nature Creation (have a neck/shoulder pack over 5 years old and still going strong!). easy to heat, comfortable to use, and not overwhelming herbal scent that I really like. Just as described, and would highly recommend any of their packs for pain relief for necks/backs/shoulders, etc.”
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B. Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the velcro closure in the front
customer_reviews.text: Don't like the velcro closure in the front. It's a bit tight around the neck. The one that is slightly more expensive without the closure is much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: and I am happy with the cooling that it provides
customer_reviews.text: “I have been using this wrap every evening before sleep since I received it a week ago, and I am happy with the cooling that it provides. I have injured shoulders from many year of sports, etc., and I recommend this product. The weight helps hold its position on the neck and shoulders and it transfers cooling well for 20 - 30 minutes.”
customer_reviews.author: Richard Shellito

customer_reviews.title: Works wel
customer_reviews.text: I like this. I used it from the freezer and I feel like it helps calm my tense shoulders!

customer_reviews.title: You'll love this product
customer_reviews.text: “Nature Creation's Upper Body Wrap is excellent and I use the product almost every night. My shoulders and neck are usually tired after a day of work on the computer and just having the wrap around them is very soothing. I usually heat it up in the microwave, but on occasions have used it as a cold pack. I highly recommend it.”
customer_reviews.author: R. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice even after half a year!
customer_reviews.text: We got a matching set of these, and my wife will put one around her neck and the other one on her lower back after a long day of teaching. We've had these for about 5 months, and they still smell fresh and keep their heat for a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings on this
customer_reviews.text: Again the heat feels nice & it's smells nice but this was too heavy for me to use while recovering from neck surgery.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my son who had chronic neck ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who had chronic neck and shoulder problems due to his line of work. It is heavy, holds the heat, and really hits the spot and does the trick.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit on the shoulder. Good for aches and pains.

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY SCENT!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A QUALITY PRODUCT. YOU WILL GET EVERY SCENT(punn intended) WORTH! I ordered a similar product prior to this one because it was slightly cheaper, but when it arrived, it looked old, used, faded and smelled bad. So I returned it, and sprung for the good stuff!! The stitching on this product is high quality and the scent is the same one I receive when I get my favorite aromatherapy massage at the spa. You WILL NOT be disappointed with this product.

customer_reviews.title: ... I have bought for myself and as gifts to good friends, who also love them

customer_reviews.title: Great

customer_reviews.title: Awesome herbal microwave heat wrap...cold pack too

THREE MORE!!!!two of the long back one and one shoulder one. And let me tell u....THE SHOULDER LNE LOOSENS YOUR WHOLE NECK AND SHOULDER AREA.....AND.....IM A TRAINER LF OVER 20 years folks!!!!! !! I mist it with a water bottle for when I need moist heat as well. THE SOOTHING SMELL of the herbs is so amazingly relaxing. Like a nice light spearmint smell almost. NOT AT ALL overpowering.

customer_reviews.title: My shoulders love it

product_meta.title: Nature Creation- Upper Body Wrap- Stiff Neck, Shoulder, Stress, Tension Relief – Microwavable Heating Pad/Cold Pack (Blue Flowers)
feature_bullets: Ideal Hot/Cold Therapy for the Neck, Shoulders, and Upper Back area- Use for Relieving Pain and Discomfort as well as Promoting Body Relaxation! Simply Heat in the Microwave for Heat Therapy or Chill in the Freezer for Cold Therapy.
Target Sore Muscles, Achy Joints, Injuries, Arthritis, Tendonitis, Stress, Tension, and the list goes on. Also, use it to keep Warm and Cozy during a Cold Winter or stay Cool during a Hot Summer.
The Pack has a small hook and loop patch in the front to secure it to your upper torso so that you can use it hands free and remain active.

This product is filled with a Blend of 10 Herbs and Grains providing a Relaxing and Soothing Aroma- giving you an added value over a regular heat pack. It is Reusable, 100% Natural, Made in USA, Eco Friendly, and Pet Safe.
